properties.SQL select query:
SELECT 
    swr.id, 
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'timestamp' AS timestamp,
    dl.location_id,  -- Ly location_id t dim_location
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'temperature' AS temperature,
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'precipitation' AS precipitation,
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'humidity' AS humidity,
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'wind_speed' AS wind_speed,
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'weather_type' AS weather_type,
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'ndvi' AS ndvi
FROM 
    climeweather.staging_weather_raw swr
JOIN 
    climeweather.dim_location dl
ON 
    swr.raw_data::jsonb->>'station_id' = dl.station_id  -- nh x station_id vi location_id
WHERE 
    swr.processed = FALSE;

processors.name: UpdateAttribute
processors.comments:
Transform Data:
- Temperature: from Kevin to Celsius
- Timestamp: to UTC

properties.timestamp: ${timestamp:toNumber():multiply(1000):toDate("EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy"):format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")}
